Description:
NPE when delete data in Outline from attached report.
Build number:2.2.1.v20070820

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report in bug #200476.
2. Select Data item in Outline and select Delete.

Expected result:
Delete data item.

Actual result:
NPE and data item isn't deleted

Error log:

This bug is actually a duplication of bug #200476. For GUI DeleteAction catches exception throw from the model, so, GUI throw an exception. Had removed the unnecessary exception catch, mark this as a duplication of bug #200476.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 200476 ***
